title: Is Zed's Q and Illaoi's Tentacles dmg reduction made the same way?
body: Based on your answer i'll know whetever to post it on the bug reports or not

replies.body: Essentially, I believe these skills work about the same way. Zed's shurikens, I *THINK*, will cause a maximum of 75% damage after the first one. Illaoi's tentacles will cause 50% less damage for each one that hits within .5 seconds, to a max of 75% less.

As far as I gather, it's just 50% from each tentacle beyond the first.

1 tentacle is 100%
2 tentacles is 150%
3 is 200%
4 is 250%
how did you get to 75% reduction? it isn't mentioned anywhere. Do you think it's worth posting it on the bug reports?
